segments.text: What a disgusting mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is spewing water all over, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor looks filthy already, spreading grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be ruined from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kidsâ€”filthy hands in the cookie jar, no doubt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balancing on that stool, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, eager for contaminated treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets collecting dust and now water too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place reeks of neglect and sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't hide this indoor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, waiting to be dirtied more by the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unaware and careless they all seem.
segments.speaker: PAR
